findings.thorax: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, enlarged heart, no pericardial effusion, vascular calcifications, calcified mitral annulus.
findings.abdomen: Normal liver, spleen, pancreas, adrenals. Mild left intrahepatic biliary dilatation. Small hypodensities in left kidney. No free fluid or pathologic lymphadenopathy. Atherosclerotic calcification in abdominal vasculature.
findings.pelvis: Extensive sigmoid diverticulosis with no perforation or abscess. Normal bladder, distal ureters, uterus, and adnexa.
